name: Oshkosh Corporation
title: Lockheed files protest against U.S. Army truck award to Oshkosh

content: WASHINGTON  Sept 8 AM General  a privately held company that built the U.S. military's original Humvee tactical vehicles  on Tuesday said it would not protest the U.S. Army's contract award last month to Oshkosh Corp to build the next generation of Humvees.
name: Oshkosh Corporation
title: AM General skips protest against U.S. Army contract to Oshkosh

content: WASHINGTON U.S. specialty truck maker Oshkosh Corp  has won a $6.75 billion contract to build 17 000 light tactical vehicles to replace the aging Humvees used by the U.S. Army and Marine Corps  the U.S. Army announced on Tuesday. | Video
name: Oshkosh Corporation

content: Aug 26 The following are the top stories in the Wall Street Journal. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
name: Oshkosh Corporation
title: PRESS DIGEST- Wall Street Journal - Aug 26

content: WASHINGTON  Aug 25 U.S. specialty truck maker Oshkosh Corp on Tuesday won a contract worth up to $6.75 billion to build 17 000 armored light tactical vehicles to replace aging Humvees used by the U.S. Army and Marine Corps  the U.S. Army announced.
name: Oshkosh Corporation
title: UPDATE 3-Oshkosh Corp wins U.S. Army award for Humvee replacement

content: WASHINGTON U.S. specialty truck maker Oshkosh Corp has won a $6.75 billion contract to build 17 000 light tactical vehicles to replace the aging Humvees used by the U.S. Army and Marine Corps  the U.S. Army announced on Tuesday.
name: Oshkosh Corporation
title: Oshkosh wins $6.75 billion deal to replace U.S. Army  Marine Humvees

content: WASHINGTON  Aug 25 U.S. specialty truck maker Oshkosh Corp has won a $6.75 billion contract to build 17 000 light tactical vehicles to replace the aging Humvees used by the U.S. Army and Marine Corps  the U.S. Army announced on Tuesday.
name: Oshkosh Corporation
title: Oshkosh wins $6.75 bln deal to replace U.S. Army  Marine Humvees

content: WASHINGTON  Aug 25 U.S. specialty truck maker Oshkosh Corp has won a multibillion-dollar competition to build a new light tactical vehicle for the U.S. Army and Marine Corps to replace their aging fleet of Humvees  sources familiar with the decision said Tuesday.
name: Oshkosh Corporation
title: Oshkosh to build Humvee replacement for U.S. military -sources

title: Truckmaker Oshkosh's quarterly profit falls 14.3 pct
